column3: ACK 312474c2e69dc0ff32b570c76e437d2317121118\n\nNice catch. How does this mistake keep sneaking back in? I thought I fixed it in the initial PR.
This breaks the test. Does this need backport?
I think #18836 actually fixes this problem (in a different way) and also has a variety of other fixes and updated tests. It may be better to review that.
